page.title: 08Recreational Activities
page.content:
In our area there is a wide range of activities for the very youngest to the very oldest. In the Youth Club there are snooker tables and pool tables; dartboards and table-tennis. The Youth Club organises outings in the school holidays as well as discos and concerts. In the Memorial Hall there is a Karate Club, sometimes discos are held there too. For the adults there bingo, snooker and a bar lounge. In the A.B.C.D Swimming Pool, beginers classes are run as well as training for competition swimmers. At St. Fothads Church there is a Brownies and Guides pack, St. Fothads has a mens association who meet to play darts, doniminos and carpet bowls.
There is a bowling-green next to the Miners Institute and here is a nine hole golf course at Auchterderran.
